subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Shackleford, the 2011 Preakness Stakes winner, held off a furious rush by Caleb’s Posse and won the $750,000 Metropolitan Handicap by a nose at Belmont Park.
snippet: Shackleford, the 2011 Preakness Stakes winner, held off a furious rush by Caleb’s Posse and won the $750,000 Metropolitan Handicap by a nose at Belmont Park.
